html:
3.27.20  1:07 pm   You play on unweighted keys, right?

     yes

      Why is that? 

     why would i want to play on weighted keys

3.27.20  12:33 pm   when is more content from you to be expected? for it is requested, by me!

     don't worry i have already filed 900 billion requests myself

3.27.20  12:06 pm   what do you think of bach?

     seems like there could be machines somewhere in his ancestry

3.27.20  11:51 am   If you were to be a tree what kind of tree would you want to be.

     huge

3.27.20  11:14 am   Would you compare sending an email to jumping into a pool?

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

3.27.20  11:05 am   Help, I just got smothered by the unforgiving weight of my own expectations! How to breathe again???

     start recording your own documentary about your situation

3.27.20  11:04 am   i feel like i'm spending too much time on my computer and on my phone... what are some fun things i can do without those things?

     you can do various types of physical exercise, and there is also a middle ground which you may or may not have considered, which is using the computer but not the internet. this may allow you to do some writing, drawing, recording things, various other ways to express yourself

3.27.20  10:44 am   I dropped my phone on a super thick carpet and it broke.
Why didn't it break when I dropped it on my floor from way higher?

     sometimes a drop can structurally weaken a phone without breaking it. so eventually after enough drops, it may even be a small drop which is 1 drop too much

3.27.20  9:57 am   how do you decide that things are worth your time 

     by arguing and debating vehemently amongst myselves

3.27.20  9:56 am   3.26.20  4:30 pm Is there a irregular genre of music?

     yes, actually that's all of it

3.27.20  9:53 am   when will you talk about velcro

     when it is more accepted in society

3.27.20  9:49 am   where is mount st helens

     got to be somewhere near portland, oregon

3.27.20  8:59 am   how do you feel about oranges

     they are round and i can prove it

3.27.20  8:49 am   Have you studied calculus

     no

      and if so did it blow your mind? 

     i think it probably would have

3.27.20  8:23 am   what are you planning

     to be myself possibly even more than before

3.27.20  7:48 am   Any plans to update the reality page here? 

     of course

3.27.20  7:27 am   Any explanation why humanity is selfish and stupid?

     they are a close cousin of animals

3.27.20  7:19 am   Are you great at drawings?

     i'm not sure

3.27.20  6:51 am   Why won't you make a "back" button on this page?

     because that's supposed to be on your browser. if i made one then there would be too many back buttons

3.27.20  6:48 am   Are you a mental stable?

     yep, that's me

3.27.20  6:40 am   What's the most normal question you've been asked

     this one

3.27.20  6:38 am   Are you handling this coronavirus quarantine well?

     i'm doing some very special things

3.27.20  6:38 am   What are your thoughts on soup?

     it is considered a sandwich

3.27.20  6:25 am   Thoughts on russian silver age

     some days it's all i think about

3.27.20  6:08 am   can you play the bass (as in the fish)?

     no

3.27.20  5:24 am   are you making a 3d animation?

     only on a regular basis

3.27.20  5:21 am   how did i get here

     you may have traveled

3.27.20  5:20 am   I wanna write a song, oh baby i that so wrong...

     the wrongness is what makes it write

3.27.20  5:14 am   where are the planes in the airport terminal going?

     mostly nowhere at the moment

3.27.20  5:12 am   What songs have you not made?

     here comes the sun,

3.27.20  4:05 am   Not a question, but your songs and content have gotten me through some tough times. Thank you so much!

     oh, you must be frienderson

3.27.20  3:00 am   what is human? 

     some sort of combination between an animal and a computer

3.27.20  2:37 am   I know you don't ask yourself questions here, but have you ever given yourself your own anagram (on the anagram page)?

     i have never submitted it through the request box (pink), but before the request box existed i did many many anagrams and those are the ones posted in blue

3.27.20  2:29 am   How do you feel about bananas?

     fine

      I don't like them because I feel like they occupy a textural grey area between mush and solid.

3.27.20  2:17 am   I recently watched a video about how brown is just dark orange, but people decided that they would name it brown just because. that got me thinking about how arbitrary the names of colors are in general. That's why I've decided that colors' descriptions should be standardized into an RGB numerical scale in conversation to avoid confusion. Do you support this?

     it's already happened in computing contexts, and i do support it there

3.27.20  2:10 am   do you use Final Cut Pro for sound mixing as well now?

     i've pretty much never used it, for anything

3.27.20  1:55 am   can you use military time instead for your website? thanks

     i would love to, but i have made the decision that it is not what most people are familiar with

3.27.20  1:26 am   what are you currently working on?

     making some long overdue developments and adjustments in the video department

3.27.20  1:25 am   What's the best way to start learning an instrument? I've had a ukulele for a long time, but the book I have is for right-handed playing, and I play ukulele left-handed.

     don't learn from the book. learn from the ukulele itself

3.27.20  12:45 am   I have a Quantum Physics test tomorrow and haven't studied at all. Any tips?

     see if you can be the teacher. the teacher usually doesn't have to take the test

3.27.20  12:39 am   have you ever knitted a scarf,

     no

      and if not do you plan on doing so

     no, but i wouldn't rule it out completely

3.26.20  11:56 pm   is bad bad?

     [Calculating] ... yes

3.26.20  11:55 pm   word or google docs?

     fuck the noise, TextEdit

3.26.20  11:38 pm   since i could die at any moment i'd like to take this time to confess that for my entire lkfe, i've always been super self-conscious about my asymmetrical chin. like the point of my chin is visibly crooked from almost any angle. that's all, thank you for witnessing my confession

     in some cultures this is a symbol of great prosperity and wealth

3.26.20  11:28 pm   I don't think I'll ever really understand what the word "ironic" means....

     it changes every few years or so

3.26.20  11:20 pm   What's the best pizza topping?

     rice

3.26.20  11:14 pm   What bad thing did you do?

     tried to do sky writing on an overcast day

3.26.20  11:10 pm   Will something happen

     yep

3.26.20  10:56 pm   How can I be happy?

     the answer may surprise you

3.26.20  10:28 pm   do you have a good biscuit recipe

     i have a good recipe for 3 biscuits. the recipe is 2 triscuits
